text: <@U02HCCTFL>: has anyone talked to uber about sponsoring rides?
Speaking with Gab this afternoon

<@U04JZANJF|amanda> uploaded a file: <https://uncorked.slack.com/files/amanda/F04R4SL59/uncorked_studios_mail_-_fwd__thingweek_inventory.pdf|Uncorked Studios Mail - Fwd_ thingweek inventory.pdf> and commented: hey <@U02HCCTFL> 3 questions:

1) <@U0265G76F> asked about food earlier. can we get the status on that? 

2) <@U02F8LF2X> sent this email about supplies for the hackathon. can you help us understand what we're ok to buy or what people should be bringing with and if that's outlined somewhere? 

3) is there a place where we can see how many people have registered? do we need to ask you for that info?

initial_comment.comment:
hey <@U02HCCTFL> 3 questions:

1) <@U0265G76F> asked about food earlier. can we get the status on that? 

2) <@U02F8LF2X> sent this email about supplies for the hackathon. can you help us understand what we're ok to buy or what people should be bringing with and if that's outlined somewhere? 

3) is there a place where we can see how many people have registered? do we need to ask you for that info?

text: Oh yeah - forgot to follow up on food. How we doing?
<@U04JZANJF>: 1. Working on food, nothing solid yet
2. Supplies are in the doc, Mager should have everything, or is grabbing it himself
3. You can see the folks registered in the splash pages, you should be an admin
and ridesharing - Uber is interested in providing vouchers, + becoming an API sponsor. Gab is pitching it to her boss this afternoon and will get back to us this week
sweet - thank you!
Cool. What's our plan B for food needs? I admit, I have no idea what drop dead dates are for getting solid leads on food.
We can order catering as late as next Wednesday.
k
So if we don't get any food sponsors by the end of this week, Elephants, pizza  etc are always good options
Cool. Who are our potentials at this point for sponsors?
We are still working on cash sponsors as well
Sizzle, laurelwood, basecamp, lardo. Working with some food people for additional options

Sounds like a plan. Food seems like the one remaining big hurdle that I'm concerned about. Want to make sure we have options for all the needs that we know of — Snacks for both days (pre-night, afternoon of hack), full lunch, full breakfast (as advertised). Anything we can do to help push this particular aspect forward?
I don't know the distance between here and being food sponsorship looks like, but want to make sure it's pretty covered.
We probably won't get sponsors for snacks, I think an instacart to costco should suffice
OK. Should we make that call now so we can get on it?
Sounds good!
cool
In case ya'll missed the discussion in basecamp, we've started a playlist - feel free to add more <https://open.spotify.com/user/magerleagues/playlist/5I0Uvdwo4ntAq5yQabUJ38>
